statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 1;

SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
